title: Does inhaling food break my Fast? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: we have Anna from Uganda when I'm fasting I know it's time for cooking there is some food places that are powdery and they inhale them during the cooking process and also when mixing juice for if that some of the juices are powdered and I inhale them is my fasting still valid when I inhale these particles so do you think if I am working 10 15 minutes before sunset in barbecuing a big fit fat juicy steak and I can smell the smoke coming and I'm inhaling it does that impact My fasting the answer is no nobody says that this is eating and drinking therefore these particles have no value at all and it does not impact your fasting foreign
